dct_description_sm: California as an island with flat northern coast and no place names. Land of Jesso and S. of Vries to northwest, and S. of Annian to north. Western Canada is called New North Wales.Prime Meridian: [Tenerife].

Reissued in: Atlas manuale : or new sett of maps of all the parts of the earth, as well Asia, Africa and America, as Europe, [Map 35] / H. Moll. -- London : for A. & J. Church, 1709. Reissued in: Atlas manuale ... , 1723.

At page top, above map: A General and Particular DESCRIPTION of AMERICA. [page] 225 (top right). Chap. (bottom right). Text begins on map verso, page 226. Issued in: The compleat geographer: or, The chorography and typography of all the known parts of the earth. To which is premis'd an ... 3rd ed.,[page] 225/ by Herman Moll. -- London: Printed for A. and J. Church, 1709

At page top, above map: A General and Particular Description of AMERICA., with AMERICA printed over the title of the map. [page] 473 (top right). CHAP I. Of America in General (bottom middle printed over bottom of the map). Reissued in: The compleat geographer ... , [page] 473 / by Herman Moll, [170?].
Without page numbers or other text. Reissued in: Atlas manuale ... [Map 35]/by Herman Moll. -- London : Printed for T. Childe and F. Churchil in Pater-Noster-Row in St. Paul's Church-yard, 1713.
Reissued in: The compleat geographer ... , [page] 189 / by Herman Moll, [1723].
